'''Greg Reese''' is a "journalist" and commentator for [[InfoWars|Infowars]].

Reese is most notable for his video reports for Infowars, covering a range of topics including politics, culture, and current events. [[Dan Friesen|Dan]] has noted that InfoWars really should have branded them as "Reese's Pieces".

He also occasionally appears as a guest on Infowars programs.
